name: Hungry Pig: puzzle game
description:
Hungry Pig is a physics puzzle game where player have to feed candies to hungry piggy. Here player need to draw a line from candy to pig so as candy can fall into pig mouth.

There can be 3 different colors of candies - green, blue and red. There are 3 different pigs having 3 different colors of cap - green, blue and red. Player need to feed green candy to piggy having green cap and so on.
Candy should not fall on ground. Player should not try to feed different color of candy to different pig.
We have exciting physics props available like line, bamboo, spring, pipe, balloon, pump and rope. use these props and play with candies. there are 300 exciting levels available. Download and start playing with candies and pigs.

COLLAPSE
